txt.en:
The bounty notice reads:

'A group of brigands has been betraying our agreement here in Urash Dâr and they must be stopped. They are working out of Zikrum-dûl and are led by the a ruthless man named Kigrush.

'Put an end to him and speak to Neshurga in Ub Nishir when you do.'

'I am glad to hear of the end of Kigrush. He broke our agreement to work together against the Orcs who ravage this land and instead choose to prey on the refugees fleeing from the chaos.\n\n'The road through Zikrum-dûl will now be safer thanks to you. Take this, [placeholder].'
A bounty notice in Ub Nishir has asked for someone to defeat ruthless leader of a group of brigands in Zikrum-dûl to the east known as Kigrush.
A bounty notice asks you to defeat Kigrush, the leader of a brigand group attacking refugees. He is reported to be found in Zikrum-dûl to the east.
Return to Neshurga in Ub Nishir north of Maurûsh and inform him that you have completed the bounty and defeated Kigrush.
Return to Neshurga and inform him of Kigrush's defeat
